Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Saint Michael's Church with its carved wooden columns, the modern-style Presidential Palace.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Strolling along the peaceful ocean corniche, visiting the Gabonese Museum of Arts and Traditions, shopping in the bustling Mont-Bouët market.
Cities.Green Spaces and Landscapes: The small Bonsuang park within the city, the city's secluded beaches.
Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Nyembwe (chicken in palm nut sauce) with cooked plantains, fresh grilled fish on the beach.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Saint Louis Cathedral, the colonial city center.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Enjoying L'Escale beach, dolphin-watching tours, fishing in the Atlantic Ocean.
Cities.Green Spaces and Landscapes: Mangrove forests around the city, Ogooué Bay.
Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Fresh oysters and seasoned carp, fried cassava cakes.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Old government buildings, the local central market.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Visiting the Omar Bongo statue, exploring the highlands of the Haut-Ogooué region, hiking on forest trails.
Cities.Green Spaces and Landscapes: Monda park with its open views, the surrounding green hills.
Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Smoked meat (especially venison) with pumpkin seed sauce.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Traditional small churches, rustic wooden houses.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Experiencing the local Fang culture, visiting the fresh agricultural produce market.

Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Cooked peanuts with rice, sweet grilled bananas.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Albert Schweitzer Hospital (an important historical medical site), riverside houses.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Historical tour of the Albert Schweitzer Hospital, boat tours on Lake Ogooué.
Cities.Green Spaces and Landscapes: The interconnected lake system around the city, the hospital's botanical garden.
Cities.Famous Local Dishes: River Tilapia, Odika vegetable stew.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Remains of old mines (industrial tourism).
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Visiting the manganese mining complex, exploring the surrounding hills and villages.
Cities.Famous Local Dishes: African vegetable stew with chicken, boiled cassava.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Traditional buildings of the Bunu tribe.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Visiting the Ibinda Caves, hiking in the savanna.
Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Mokabi dish (stuffed banana leaves), mashed bananas.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Makokou Bridge.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Starting point for Ivindo National Park, river boat trips.
Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Seasoned river fish, fresh forest fruits.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Koulamoutou Market.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Visiting the nearby Boundolo Waterfalls, hiking in mountain forests.
Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Kebondo (meat and bean dish), rice with vegetables.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Gamba Research Station.

Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Grilled seafood, chicken buried in the sand.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Rova Palace (complex of royal palaces), Avenue de l'Indépendance.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Exploring the Queen's Palace (Rova), visiting the Zoma Market, strolling around Lake Anosy.

Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Romazava (meat and vegetable stew in broth), Ravitoto (cassava leaf stew with meat).

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Mount Passot (highest point), the Des Sasques lighthouse.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Diving and snorkeling in the Mitsio Archipelago, fishing in the Indian Ocean, visiting Amatovaka beaches.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Our Lady of La Salette Cathedral, the colonial train station.

Cities.Green Spaces and Landscapes: Lake Andraikiba, the hills of Antsirabe.
Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Koba (sweet rice and peanut cake), banana cake.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Traditional markets in the city.

Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Morondava's famous prawn dish, Sarimalona (braised meat).

Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Visiting the Antsokay Arboretum, exploring the coral reefs in Saint-Augustin Bay.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Old Fianarantsoa city.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Train journey through the rainforest, visiting vineyards in the south.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Mahajanga Mosque, the Cyclone Baobab.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Historical pirate cemetery.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: The old fort.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Surfing on nearby beaches, visiting Lanano Lake.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Jemaa el-Fnaa square, Bahia Palace, Ben Youssef Madrasa.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Hassan II Mosque (tallest minaret in the world), Sacré-Cœur Cathedral.

Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Traditional Moroccan couscous, seafood dishes on the corniche.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: University of Al-Qarawiyyin, traditional tanneries (Chouara), Bab Boujloud gate.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Outa el Hammam square, the Kasbah (old fort).
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Photographing the enchanting blue alleys, shopping for wool handicrafts, hiking to Akchour waterfalls.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Kasbah of Tangier, Grand Théâtre.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Hassan Tower, Kasbah of the Udayas, Mausoleum of Mohammed V.

Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Rfissa (a popular dish with chicken and lentils), various Moroccan pastries.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Agadir Oufella Kasbah (panoramic view), Souk El Had.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Enjoying the large Agadir beach, visiting the Agadir Oufella Kasbah, shopping at Souk El Had.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Ramparts of Essaouira, the old port of Essaouira.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Bab Mansour (the monumental gate), Mausoleum of Moulay Ismail.
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Visiting Bab Mansour, exploring the Sahrij Swani basin, taking a day trip to the Roman ruins of Volubilis.
Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Tagine with pickled olives and lemon, Meknesi olives.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Taourirt Kasbah, Film Studios (Hollywood of Africa).
Cities.Most Important Tourist Activities and Ex: Visiting the film studios, exploring the Taourirt Kasbah, a trip to Aït Benhaddou Kasbah (UNESCO site).

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Christ the Redeemer statue, Sugarloaf Mountain, the Lapa district (colonial architecture).

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Itaipu Dam (one of the largest dams in the world).

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Marc Chagall Museum (the famous painter), the Summer Amphitheatre.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Nesvizh Castle (UNESCO site), Corpus Christi Church.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Traditional island villages.

Cities.Prominent Historical and Architectural L: Colonial houses, city center.

Cities.Famous Local Dishes: Ajvar (roasted red pepper spread), Pastrmajlija (local pie), Kavapi (minced meat dish), Turšija (pickled vegetables).
